alert.note: Alert for DeSoto; Hardee; Highlands; Inland Charlotte; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Manatee; Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 6:57PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Highlands, Hardee, northeastern Manatee, eastern Charlotte, southwestern Polk, southeastern Hillsborough and DeSoto Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 657 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fish Hawk to near Babcock Ranch. Movement was north at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lakeland, Plant City, Bartow, Arcadia, Wauchula, Fish Hawk, Ona, Babcock Webb Wma, Lakeland Linder Airport, Southeast Arcadia, Medulla, Babcock Ranch, Sweetwater, Fort Meade, Mulberry, Bowling Green, Zolfo Springs, Homeland, Alafia River State Park and Nocatee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: DeSoto; Hardee; Highlands; Inland Charlotte; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Manatee; Polk
